metadata.Title: CVE-2020-6073 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: An exploitable denial-of-service vulnerability exists in the TXTrecord-parsing functionality of Videolabs libmicrodns 0.1.0. When parsingthe RDATA section in a TXT record in mDNS messages, multiple integeroverflows can be triggered, leading to a denial of service. An attacker cansend an mDNS message to trigger this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: libmicrodns: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
vlc: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
